title: Goblet, 1986-61-11, ca. 1800
inscribed: "JD" in vine motif engraved on foot.
provenance: S. J. Shrubsole, Ltd., London; 1969 WPW
dimensions: H x diam.: 13.9 x 7 cm (5 1/2 x 2 3/4 in.)
description: Semi-elliptical bowl on hollow seamed spool stem and circular foot; gilt interior; base filled with lead-tin alloy; "JD" engraved on foot.

exhibitions.title: Tools for the Table: Designs for Dining
